headline: Inferno Tears Through Alabama Boat Dock, Killing 8
abstract: The fire tore through a wooden dock in Scottsboro, destroying dozens of boats and plunging survivors into the water.
lead_paragraph: SCOTTSBORO, Ala. â€” Tim Cuzzort drove fast through the early morning darkness, swerving on winding country roads toward a fire that had lit up a patch of the northern Alabama sky. He had been jolted awake by a phone call, from someone alerting him to a large fire that had ripped through the marina where his daughter, her husband and their children lived in house boats.
